job.name: 2016Embedding
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} set Name = `basename $PWD` setenv NODEBUG yes setup 64b setenv STARFPE NO # starver TFG18a starver .DEV2 set muDst = ${INPUTFILE0} set base = `basename ${muDst} .MuDst.root`; # set daq = /star/data03/daq/2016/126/17126033/${base}.daq # set daq = `ls -1d /star/data03/daq/2016/*/*/${base}.daq` # set daq = `ls -1d /net/l404/data/fisyak/daq/2016/*/*/${base}.daq` set DAQ = ""; if (-d /net/l401/data/scratch1/daq) then set DAQ = /net/l401/data/scratch1/daq else set DAQ = /star/data03/daq endif set daq = `ls -1d ${DAQ}/2016/*/*/${base}.daq` if (! -r ${daq}) exit 1; # set name = "Lc3pi"; set name = "" foreach name ( antiprotonmTsq5PerCentZ6cm protonmTsq5PerCentZ6cm \ KNmTsq5PerCentZ6cm KPmTsq5PerCentZ6cm \ piNmTsq5PerCentZ6cm piPmTsq5PerCentZ6cm \ D02KmTsq D0K0s2KmTsq D0K0s2pimTsq D0K3pimTsq D0KpimTsq \ DK0s3pimTsq DK0spimTsq DK2pimTsq \ DsK0sK0spimTsq DsK0sK2pimTsq DsK0sKmTsq DsKKpimTsq \ Lc3pi Lc3pimT Lc3pimTsq LcKppi LcKppimT LcKppimTsq \ D0KpiCutpT0_1 D0KpiCutpT3_10 D0KpiCutpT0 DK2pimCutpT0 D0barKpiCutpT0 D02KmCutpT0) echo $Name | grep $name if (! $?) break; end echo "name = $name"; if ($name == "") exit 1; set file = ${base}.MuDst.root set logFile = ${base}B.log echo "${file}" setenv StarEndMakerShell if ( ! -r ${file}) then # root.exe -q -b -x 'bfcMixerVMC.C(10000,"Vmc,Lc3pi,VMCAlignment","'${daq}'","'${muDst}'")' >& ${logFile} # root.exe -q -b -x 'bfcMixerVMC.C(10000,"Vmc,'${name}',VMCAlignment","'${daq}'","'${muDst}'")' >& ${logFile} # root.exe -q -b -x 'bfcMixerVMC.C(1000,"Vmc,'${name}',VMCAlignment","'${daq}'","'${muDst}'")' >& ${logFile} root.exe -q -b -x 'bfcMixerVMC.C(1000,"Vmc,'${name}',VMCAlignment","'${daq}'","'${muDst}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
